title: "China is also watching what's happening here" per @ODNIgov's Haines, "If China sees. If they see that resolve weaken and our...
content: "China is also watching what's happening here" per @ODNIgov's Haines, "If China sees. If they see that resolve weaken and our inability to maintain assistance that is going to be a lesson that they're going to learn for the future, for their own assertive efforts"
author: Live UA Map
